name: Andy's Dark Tale
description:
Andy, on a night like many others, woke up and discovered that his special little brother Yon had been kidnapped by a dragon!

He ventures into his spooky world to reach Yon and save him.

******

The project is under development and I have many additions in mind, but for Halloween I wanted to release this beta version with a playable level and see if you like the game and if I can continue to develop it.

The beta version of the game offers a gameplay of about 10-20 minutes!

So tell me how to improve it, tell me if there are bugs and above all, tell me if you like it!!!

Have fun!
